name: Coming Soon
description:
You play a PR manager, trying to build up publicity for the latest game Angle of Incidence.

Use arrow keys to select dialogue. Play the game with W/S.

Loosely inspired by the Cool Jams Inc. theme:

"You are the PR head for a game company, trying to make it onstage at other companies' E3 conferences."

Edward Lu - Programming

Zuoming Shu - Programming

Matt Osowski - Music & SFX

Edward Yang - Art & Assets
